original: ***Gate will open in 15s! Defend yourself against the zombies!***
zh_trans: ***大门将在15秒后开启！保护好自己别被僵尸抓了!***

original: ***Gate will close in 10s! Defend your position against the zombies!***
zh_trans: ***大门将在10秒后开启！坚守阵地!***

original: ***Gate will open in 30s! Defend yourself against the zombies!***
zh_trans: ***大门将在30秒后开启！保护好自己!***

original: ***Boat is leaving in 30s! Get on quick!!!***

zh_trans: *** 宙斯的闪电将在10秒后击中希腊！****
